metadata.synopsis: Zarys is fleeing while her hideout blows up around her. Player is pursuing.

0.speaker: Zarys
0.text: You're making a bad mistake, my friend. Last chance to turn back.
0.context: NodeContext: Stlarning is a harsh curse word in her world. You've forced her to turn around and kill you

1.speaker: Zarys
1.text: Why couldn't you just run away, you stlarning lunatic?
